title: Canvas Stickfigure
description: A funny stickfigure that moves around when you press the arrow-keys.

title: Connect Four
description: The famous connect-four game, remastered with never seen efects.

title: Kitty Carousel
description: Cute kitties moving around. For pure fun purposes, there are still some bugs included.

title: Spotify Search
description: Look for your favourite artists or particular albums. My ingenious code will show you the results and can redirect you to the Spotify website!

title: News Ticker
description: Some very interesting and informative news-headlines from all around the world. And the best? They will keep coming in forever!

title: Panes
description: Which of these two pictures do you like the most? Hide the one you don't like by dragging the middle bar with your mouse.
